title: Alvin Lustig Honored: Why don't more sites like this one exist?
content:
Via Coudal Partners

Alvin Lustig was a renaissance man. A designer that didn't shy away from any media and seemingly mastered any in which he worked. Students today -- that is, anyone that enjoys learning from those who have gone before -- should spend time and study his work.

[http://www.alvinlustig.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023063340/http:/www.alvinlustig.org/ "http://www.alvinlustig.org/")
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
Thank you, Tiffany, for the link to a wonderful site that pays homage to Mr. Lustig.

Even ol' coots, like moi, still _"enjoy learning from those who have gone before"_.

Olde coots like me also learn from those who have come after me.  
Thanks to all the wizz kids here who help me out when I need it!
